/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, is flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the dynamic scene below. Cars of various colors are scattered across the street, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
